description: This file contains unit tests for a React application's App component, testing UI rendering, backend API interaction, and error handling using Jest and React Testing Library.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up DOM container for each test and mocks fetch globally.

methods.name: afterEach
methods.description: Removes DOM container after each test and resets mocks.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines individual test cases for React component rendering and fetch responses.
